SEARCH
Package gutek.gui.controllers.main

Class NewDeckFXMLController

java.lang.Object
gutek.gui.controllers.FXMLController
gutek.gui.controllers.main.NewDeckFXMLController
@Component public class NewDeckFXMLController extends FXMLController
Controller for the New Deck view, allowing users to create a new deck or import cards from a file.

Users can specify a deck name and choose a revision algorithm, then add a new deck or import cards directly into the deck from an external file.

    • chooseImportFile

      private File chooseImportFile()
      Opens a file chooser dialog to select the CSV file for importing cards.
      Returns:
      The selected File object, or null if no file was selected.

    • importCardsFromFile

      private boolean importCardsFromFile(File file, RevisionAlgorithm<?> algorithm, DeckBase deck)
      Imports cards from the given CSV file into the specified deck.
      Parameters:
      file - The CSV file containing card data.
      algorithm - The revision algorithm used to create new cards.
      deck - The deck to which the cards will be added.
      Returns:
      true if the import was successful, false otherwise.
